channel.title: home on Innumerable Random Formations
channel.description: Recent content in home on Innumerable Random Formations

item.title: hello world.
item.description: irf stands for “innumerable random formations.” I came across this phrase in Stephen Greenblatt’s book Swerve, and it immediately felt like a good metaphor for the way my mind races from one unfinished thought to another. I decided to start this blog because I realized that if I never pause and write down my thoughts, I never actually process them. I never engage with them. I don’t even remember most of them.
